title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press 'Add' for the associated editors.

Suggestions:

a. Enable multiple selection in the dialog.

b. 'Add' should not add a hidden entry.

c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. Provide a width hint for the dialog.

g. Investigate why the File editors Preferences page increases in height when selected, while other pages do not.

Updates:

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: When there is no selection, the 'OK' button remains enabled.
EB: 'Add' should not add a hidden entry. Entries already existing in the associated editors list should not be available for selection.
